mapper.select: SELECT id, port_code, name_cn, name_en, home_country, alias_name FROM sea_port where id = #{id}

SELECT sp.id, sp.port_code, sp.name_cn, sp.name_en, sp.home_country, sp.alias_name, co.name_cn as country_name_cn, co.name_en as country_name_en FROM sea_port sp INNER JOIN country co ON sp.home_country = co.country_code
1 = 1
and sp.home_country = #{key.homeCountry}
and (sp.port_code = #{key.keyword} OR sp.name_cn LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{key.keyword} , '%' ) OR sp.home_country LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{key.keyword} , '%' ) OR sp.alias_name LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{key.keyword} , '%' ) OR co.name_cn LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{key.keyword} , '%' )
OR sp.name_en LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{key.keyword} , '%' ) OR co.name_en LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{key.keyword} , '%' ) )

SELECT id, port_code, name_cn, name_en FROM sea_port
(port_code = #{portCode} OR name_cn = #{nameCn} OR name_en = #{nameEn})
AND id != #{id}
order by port_code
